General.Name: Warehouse REIT plc
General.Description: Warehouse REIT plc is a closed-ended Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT) with an indefinite life incorporated in England and Wales on 24 July 2017. The Company began trading on 20 September 2017. The registered office of the Company is located at 65 Gresham Street, London EC2V 7NQ. The Company's shares are admitted to trading on the Premium Listing Segment of the Main Market, a market operated by the London Stock Exchange.
General.Address: Gorse Stacks House, Chester, United Kingdom, CH1 3EQ
